front.title: A Registry of Assignments using Ubiquitous Technologies and Careful Policies

abstract.t: Registries are a critical part of many of the systems which inhabitthe Internet today. Unfortunately, not a lot of the assignmentswithin those registries are as accessible as they could be. Thisdocument outlines a best current practice approach to improving theaccessibility of assignments within registries using ubiquitoustechnologies and low cost supporting policies.
